content:
Harer family

1 Jakob HARER                        1781-87 - 1854 #336 (Judas)
 + Goldy                             c1789 - 1849 #621 (Zelig)
  2x Juda Salomon HARER              1809-10 - 1848 #240
    + Leja STRIKER                   1804
          married Jun 12, 1832 #40
     3o Itel Temerl HARER            Sep 1833 #409
       * Abraham Mojzesz GRUNBAUM    ?Aug 15/ ?May 20, 1834 Chrzanow
             married Dec 15, 1864 #35
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Zelig Feiwel HARER           1836 #327 - 1836 #295
     3o Chaja Perla HARER            Oct 16, 1837 #516 - May 1, 1875 #127
       * Izak Schaia SPAGATNER       Jul 22, 1835 #400 - after 1900
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Moyzesz Izaak HARRER         Aug 4, 1840 #353 - 1845 #36
     3x Jozef Hirsz HARRER           Mar 20, 1844 #102 - 1844 #170
     3o Baila HARRER                 Apr 22, 1846 #192
       * Saul Izrael SUSSER          Chrzanow
        4o Lea SUSSER                1872 #647 - Feb 12, 1873 #53
        4o Sara SUSSER               Feb 3, 1874 #150
       * Mozes DRESNER               ?Jan 7, 1849 #13 / ?Dec 10, 1849 (1850#10)
        4x Juda Salomon DRESNER      Aug 10, 1877 #541
  2x Baruch HARER                    1811 #135b - Jan 1, 1817 #2
  2o Chaja Gitel HARER               1819 #379 - 1824 #71
  2x Aron HARER                      1822 #11
    + Rifka REISFELD                 c1817 - 1852 #406
     3x son HARRER                   Aug 14, 1845 #413 - 1845 #298
     3o Golda HARER                  - 1853 #313
     3o Perel Laja HARRER            Aug 27, 1849 #334
     3x Salomon Berl HARRER          1851 #203 - 1852 #60
     3x Aron HARRER                  Nov 17, 1852 #533
    + Hanna 
     3o Ester HARER                  - 1854 #113
  2? Toni HARER                      1824 #191 - 1828 #249
  2o Selde HARER                     - 1831 #413
